newsitem.title: EU: EP RULES OF PROCEDURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 25-26.
newsitem.headline: EP RULES OF PROCEDURE COMMITTEE AGENDA - NOV 25-26.

text.p: Committee on the Rules of Procedure, the Verification of Credentials and Immunities [[ Monday 25 November 1996 ]] CONFERENCE CENTRE ROOM C - TEL: 4302 57174 or 57489 0.1 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE220.199 ) 2. Approval of minutes of meeting of: - 9 and 10 October 1996 (PE219.645 ) 2.1 INTERPRETATION 3. Rules 46, 92 and 94 - procedure for presenting Council recommendations in pl enary (T04874) REG0070 + REGL Fond DONNELLY Brendan P. (PPE) (PE219.212/REV) - Adoption of draft interpretation 4. Rule 92(2) - tabling of oral amendments to recommendations not available in all languages (T04875) REG0071 + REGL Fond DONNELLY Brendan P. (PPE) - Exchange of views 5. Possibility of Parliament delivering an opinion on an amendment to a text th at it has already officially approved (T04744) REG0064 + REGL Fond R FABRE-AUBRESPY Herve (EDN) (PE216.261 ) - Consideration of working document 6. Rule 150 - Interpretation of Rule 124(6) on oral amendments tabled in commit tee (T04919) REG0073 + REGL Fond GUTIERREZ DIAZ A. (GUE) - Initial exchange of views 7. Rule 141: membership of subcommittees (T04926) REG0074 + REGL Fond DELL'ALBA Gianfranco (ARE) (PE218.150 ) - Consideration of working document 8. Rule 12 - Brief address by oldest Member (DVR0424 ) - Appointment of rapporteur 8.1 AMENDMENT 9. The conduct of debates in plenary sitting (T04622) INI0478 INI0478 + REGL Fond WIJSENBEEK Florus A. (ELD) - Consideration of working document 10. Simplification of procedures for the presentation of annual reports to Parl iament (T04623) INI0479 INI0479 + REGL Fond CROWLEY Brian. (UPE) - Exchange of views 11. Code of conduct for representatives of interest groups (T04834) REG0066 + REGL Fond R FORD James G. (PSE) (PE219.668 ) - Consideration of draft report 12. Cooperation between the committees responsible and those asked for their op inions (DVR0425 ) - Appointment of rapporteur 13. Action to be taken on the coordinators' proposals (1) 14. Committee calendar for 1997 - Consideration and possibly adoption (PE219.642 ) 15. Any other business 16. Date of next meeting (PE/XVIII/OJ/96615 )

[FOOTNOTES]1. ) Coordinators' meetings on 31 October and 25 November 1996 A N N E X 0.1 0.2 COORDINATORS' MEETING 0.3 1. Adoption of draft agenda (PE220.199/ANN ) 2. Rule 123(5) - Disputes concerning the vote on Mr Riis-Jorgensen's report (DV R0439 ) - Proposal for action to be taken - Possibly, proposal for appointment of a rapporteur 3. Letter from Mr JANSSEN VAN RAAY concerning a decision by the Bureau calling on the committee to draw up a proposal for a statute for assistants - Proposal concerning action to be taken 4. Protocol on Privileges and Immunities and procedure for applying tax (amendm ent of Regs 549/69 and 260/68) (T04973) CNS96214 COM(96)0400 C4-0534/96 CNS96215 COM(96)0400 C4-0535/96 + REGL Avis F JURI Fond R ROTHLEY Willi. (PSE) (PE219.734 ) F JURI Fond ROTHLEY Willi. (PSE) (PE219.734 ) - Proposal for action to be taken - Possibly, proposal with a view to appointing a rapporteur - FIN - END OF DOCUMENT.
